page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE (cont.)
page.content:
12.40 Lunch. Today I had shepherds pie and two veg. followed by apple pie and custard. 1.50 Afternoon lessons and/or activity This term I am doing farming, squash,photograpy,fencing and ecology. 5.30 Tea. This was chicken, chips and peas and fruit. 6.00 Freetime. 7.00 Prep. This is homework. 8.30 Swimming in the house pool. 9.00 Scrape - or milk and biscuits. 9.15 T.V. usually detective programmes 9.45 Change for bed and lights out. 10.30 Chat illegally in dormitory until asleep !
Richard is a first year pupil at St. Bede's school, Uper Dicker and is a termly boarder at Camberlot Hall.
